titleStmt.title: A fast-sermon, preached to the Lords in the High-Court of Parliament assembled on the day of solemn humiliation for the continuing pestilence, Octob. 3, 1666 and by their order published by George, Lord Bishop of Chester.
titleStmt.author: Hall, George, 1612?-1668.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
